title: Pixfigure usage
text: Optionally, captions can added images displayed images well lightbox.
code: pixfigure(paths[1], caption = "Night sky over the mountains")

title: Pixfigure usage
text: default TRUE, means clicking thumbnail opens image lightbox. Setting FALSE turns links. setting character vector, can add custom links.
code: pixfigure(paths[1:2], link = FALSE) pixfigure(paths[1:2], caption = c("Night sky over the mountains", "Though the dense rainforest"), link = FALSE) pixfigure(paths[1:2], link = c("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milky_Way", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rainforest")) pixfigure(paths[1:2], caption = c("Night sky over the mountains", "Through the dense rainforest"), link = c("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milky_Way", "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rainforest"))

title: Pixfigure usage
text: argument h w used adjust dimension image. value string valid css unit.
code: pixfigure(paths[1], w = "400px") pixfigure(paths[3], h = "400px", caption = "shark")

title: Pixfigure usage
text: argument fit used control css property object-fit. set cover default. Resize width page see effect fit="cover". image scales within ’s frame rather shrink. Explore css property object-fit details, example, w3schools.
code: pixfigure(paths[1], h = "600px")

title: Pixfigure usage
text: argument position determines image positioned within frame. controls css property object-position. youtube video discusses fit position.
code: pixfigure(paths[1], h = "400px", w = "400px", position = "left") pixfigure(paths[1], h = "400px", w = "400px", position = "right")

title: Pixfigure usage
text: Input can also vector images. Images displayed one .
code: pixfigure(paths, caption = c("Night sky over the mountains", "Walking through dense woodland", "Out in the open seas"), h = "200px", w = "250px", position = "left")

title: Pixgallery usage
text: Optionally, captions can added images visible viewed lightbox. Images without captions can set NA. Captions properties caption_valign caption_halign allows captions displayed thumbnails. caption_valign options top, center, bottom . caption_halign options left, center right.
code: captions <- c("night", "forest", "shark", "coconut trees", "flowers", "field", "misty", "leaves", "sunset", "mountains", "swamp", "rainstorm", "leaves", "beach", "leopard", "sunflower") pixgallery(paths_a, caption = captions) pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = c("night", "forest", NA, "coconut trees")) pixgallery(paths_a[1], caption = "night") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "top") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "center") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "bottom") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "below") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "center", caption_halign = "center") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "below", caption_halign = "center")

title: Pixgallery usage
text: Captions properties caption_valign caption_halign allows captions displayed thumbnails. caption_valign options top, center, bottom . caption_halign options left, center right.
code: pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "top") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "center") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "bottom") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "below") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "center", caption_halign = "center") pixgallery(paths_a[1:4], caption = captions[1:4], caption_valign = "below", caption_halign = "center")

title: Pixgallery usage

title: Create an image gallery — pixgallery
text: path character vector full paths images. caption character vector captions images (Optional). must equal length path. caption_valign character denoting position caption. Options 'none', 'top', 'center', 'bottom' ''. caption_halign character denoting horizontal justification caption. Options 'left', 'center' 'right'. link logical character vector. happens click thumbnail? TRUE opens lightbox, FALSE disable lightbox. character vector custom URLs equal length path. h character denoting height image thumbnails valid CSS units. w character denoting width image thumbnails valid CSS units. gap character denoting spacing thumbnails valid CSS units. border_radius character denoting corner radius image thumbnails valid CSS units. layout character denoting gallery layout type. Options "grid", "fixed", "mosaic", "masonry", "justified", "elastic" "rhombus". See details. shuffle logical indicating whether images randomly shuffled. width character denoting width widget valid CSS units. height character denoting height widget valid CSS units. elementId character string denoting parent container ID. dim Deprecated. Use 'h' 'w'. type Deprecated. Use 'layout'.

title: Create an image gallery — pixgallery
text: grid: Grid responsive layout. Dimensions mostly fluid fit parent. fixed: grid strictly fixed dimensions. Defaults square image. using `caption_valign` options 'top', 'bottom' 'center', note long captions may overflow. mosaic: Grid layout mixed sizes. masonry: Column layout images flow vertically. Image height set. using `caption_valign` options 'top', 'bottom' 'center', note long captions may overflow. justified: Similar masonry images flow horizontally. Image width set. using `caption_valign` options 'top', 'bottom' 'center', note long captions clipped. Option '' may cause images stretched captions long. elastic: Single row layout images magnified hover. Image width set. Captions displayed thumbnails. rhombus: Diamond shaped layout three columns. Image size number columns fixed. Completely non-responsive without breakpoints. Captions displayed thumbnails.
